entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon then light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
